channel.title: Decomposing Client Sprites
channel.description:
Currently, I am trying to rework the client to not load any sprites for the GameFrame whatsoever. Make it back into a simple Java GUI.
There is one problem, however.
I can not find a SINGLE instance of any jButton, jPanel, jLabel, anything. The one thing I did find was a jFrame, but that led to nothing useful.
Any help on where I can find these things?

item.title: Decomposing Client Sprites
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
